content: the fabulous **net for your yoga mat** 1 - now in an amazing shade-in-shade version the net is crocheted double stranded in rainbow 8/4 changing the colors as you work to create a pretty shade-in-shade effect the net is closed with ties at the top and fitted with a handle so you can easily bring your yoga mat with you on the go combine e g with a clever holder for your water bottle or a beach net in the same line **materials ** rainbow cotton 8/4 - the bag is crocheted holding two strands of yarn together crochet hook 4 mm us size g/6 yarn usage approx color a 35g color b 30g color c 30g color d 30g color e 30g **size ** fits the size of a standard yoga mat 180x60 cm - 3-5 mm of thickness **abbreviations** **magic_ring** magic_ring **chain** chain **st s ** stitch es **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** half_double_crochet **slip_stitch s ** slip_stitch es 1 https //hobbii com/ombre-net-bag-for-yoga-mat utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=ombre-net-bag-for-yoga-mat+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
